verbose_text: As well known, empagliflozin inhibits sodium-glucose cotransporter 2 (SGLT2), and in EMPA-REG OUTCOME its cardiovascular safety was tested in a population of patients with type 2 diabetes at high cardiovascular risk no different from that of the population in the Trial Evaluating Cardiovascular Outcomes With Sitagliptin (TECOS), which showed no cardiovascular benefit.
